locationAddress: Asker Ocaƒüƒ± Cd. No:6 The Ritz-Carlton, Istanbul, Vi≈ünezade, Suzer Plaza, Istanbul 34367 T√ºrkiye
restaurantContent: The passionate pursuit of good food is elevated to a fine art form at the hotel‚Äôs new restaurant, At√∂lye. Celebrating culinary excellence, the open kitchen entices with its Anatolian cuisine. Private Chef‚Äôs Table experience is available for those seeking dining exclusivity and a showcase cellar with local and international wines.

reviews.ratingContent: We stayed 6 nights in the Ritz Carlton Istanbul and had breakfast in the hotel‚Äôs amazing Atolye restaurant every morning. The food was excellent with the best ingredients and produce and was paired with the most attentive and thoughtful service. We stayed with 3 children and the restaurant staff made sure that all our wishes were fulfilled. Since my kids are not good eaters in the morning they prepared a takeaway breakfast every morning. The team led by Burak √áaƒülar made us feel very welcome and pampered. It was truly fantastic.
Delightful breakfast and great service from the staff, especially Burak Gaglar. Wonderful views from the restaurant.

Great view of Bosphorus strait, Good breakfast with enough option to choose from. During our 3 days stay, we have an excellent experience especially from waiter/ess Nisa and Halil that Always make sure our needs are met. When my husband is not feeling well and can not go to the restaurant, Halil prepared two boxes of food and a cup of ( mixed ginger,Apple, lemon and mint) juice to bring to the room for him.
excellent view with very wonderful service, the food is variety and especially tasting even with bacon abd the bread selection are wide
Nisa Halil Furkan is the best. Good restaurant in Ritz hotel with good breakfasts and lunch. I can recommend hummus. )))
Lovely breakfast at the Ritz Carlton Hotel in Istanbul and great and efficient service especially from Burak, Caglar and Omer

Firstly, before you enter, you are created by a gorgeous view of the body of water that Istanbul is famous for.Next, we were super warmly greeted by Arzu! Such a friendly person who makes you feel at home, away from home. She understood that it was our first time here and introduced the spread and the workings of the restaurant.Lastly, spread was good! No lousy items on the spread.Thanks Arzu!
Amazing breakfast spread and beautiful view. Service was amazing, we were greeted brightly by Arzu who showed us to our table and explained the breakfast buffet spread. Highly recommended!

We love this restaurant. As guests of the hotel we have had breakfast here each morning and the food is fresh and delicious, and the staff very attentive and helpful. Special mention and thanks to Halil, Nisa and Furkan who made our experience very enjoyable and their service is excellent.
We have been in contact with Miss.Nisa. She is very professional and kind. Best Service ever. She suggested plates and locali drinks. She has always a smile.

Amazing ‚Äúfarm to table‚Äù breakfast buffet.  Vegan or otherwise absolutely finest, freshest, assortment. Many thanks to staff including Selcuk Nisa Burak Berkay.   The views looking into the far east across the Bosporus truly inspirational   üëçüëçüëç
I would like to thank Halil for exemplify unparalleled service, their dedication, attentiveness, and genuine warmth enhancing every aspect of the breakfast experience.

Very warm welcome with staff  Selcuk, Burak, Alisan and Berkay.   Great service and attentive.    The food could have had a better selection.  Disappinted with the jams and butter.   Not at par with other hotels.
Belay and Ali≈üon provided outstanding service at the lovely breakfast buffet. Amazing view and open bufe is beautiful.

We came with my friend to Istanbul for the first time and decided to visit the Ritz-Carlton. We came for breakfast. Unfortunately, the omelette was overcooked, but the rest of the dishes were delicious. I would like to thank Burak and Mustaf√° for their genuine care! They were very approachable and always ready to help. This is actually our best service experience in Istanbul. Well done!
Amazing breakfast buffet! Burak was very attentive, and gave us coffees to takeaway at the end as well. The Turkish warm meal options were very tasty!
Excellent variety of breakfast options, amazing view of the Bosphorus and the biggest bonus was fantastic customer service. Kudos to Selcuk who took care of our table!
The service was really great Selcuk and Nisa did an amazing job looking after our new born while we have our breakfast. I would also like to thank Alisan for her hospitality.

Breakfast buffet in the morning had a lot of choices - European specialties, Turkish pastries, cheeses, meats, smoked fish, fresh organic greens and fruits. Eggs were perfectly done to order, my husband likes sunny side up and it‚Äôs hard to find not overcooked perfectly done...More
Good breakfast amazing service from Berkay. Perfect open bufe and beautiful view. I highly recommend. Thank you sooo much

The food is excellent and the staff are very friendly. However, if you're seeking value for money, this might not be the best choice. There are better restaurants where you can enjoy equally delicious food at half the price. This place remains within the tourist trap area.
The best iskander and clay pot kebab. The service is excellent and the staff nice and very kind. Higly recommended for nice dinner or lunch.
As l wrote on all web for recommended its best t√ºrkish cuƒ±sine we had with my famlly great joppppp ser you agaƒ±n on the next ttƒ±ppppp

brunch las tapas istanbul kebap fish and meT excelent we wll recomend it the worth resturant in istanbul tourisstik area

perfect place,perfect dishes,perfect servis.if you want delisious healthy turkish food come herewe are there for 3 hours and everything was perfect
Fantastic food and a great atmosphere. Friendly staff and the clay pot topping is entertaining. you have to visit when you are istanbul

Very delicious. I had lamb chops and it was so good. The taste was quite international and the meat was soft and juicy. The waiter was so friendly and helpful. Definitely recommend ! best food in istanbul i have ever had !!!!!

Very nice staff, very tasty food. Our daughter likes it very much. Tasty food and very kind and attentive staff.We wait for our meal about 15 min, not bad at all. They served us tea and turkish baklava as a compliment‚Ä¶ we were impressed.Recommend!!!

Busssines trip in turkey after antalya we try to old city was absulutly  wery good upsters was firee place  we worming wellcome by bossss
Las tapas deserv number one in Istanbul alll Romania people are coming bere because its wery good food and Serbia se wll revine d everone Nice restaurante

locationAddress: NURUOSMANƒ∞YE CADDESƒ∞ NO . 5 NURUOSMANƒ∞YE CADDESƒ∞ NO: 5, Istanbul 34440 T√ºrkiye

reviews.ratingContent: Yilmaz, the best service, great dish otman testi tavuk, I recommend it, everyone should try it. An additional attraction is the show while serving this dish.
Excellent place. Yilmaz serve us in an incredible way. Very good food and atmosphere. We ate fish and typical turkish dishes. Everything was delicious

The food here is delicious and the service is really friendly. The adana kebab was the best I've had in my entire time in Turkiye. Absolutely delicious. However, the reason it's not 5/5 stars is because the price is really steep. When we went, the total for one adana kebab was 616 lira or $20.42. That's steep even by New York standards. But again, service was really friendly and they gave us free Turkish tea and baklava on the house!
Best food in Istanbul! Yilmaz the best service!!! Very friendly staff Very nice place! !!!! You should visit for sure!!!

Had the urfa kebab which was delicious! The pitta was so fresh and fluffy and the rice was awesome. We sat on the street with a beer and we had baklava for dessert which was great. Really good service and would definitely come again! A great find after hunting for a while for a good spot for lunch.
Lovely place, great service and really kind people. The food was awesome. Absolutely recomend√©. Yilmaz the BEST one so far.
Food was good and attention was amazing. Yilmaz was welcoming and helpful. We got complimentary baklava and tea. Very nice seating restaurant close to Grand Bazar.
Incredible food and even better service! Yilmaz was our waiter and he was awesome. He also understood spanish. I really recommend to try all of their Kebabs!
Yilmaz was extremely attentive, kind, and gave the absolute best service. The food was also deliciously seasoned and the meat was of great quality.
We came to this place because it was recommended by our tour guide and it was way worth it! Tasteful food, good quality and  superb service (thanks Yilmaz)! Pd: Yilmaz habla muy buen espa√±ol!

We came here because our tour guide Nadir (Spanish-speaking free tour) gave us the recommendation. Good location, good food, courtesy tea after the meal üôÇyilmaz was very attentive and he spoke Spanish to us!
Food is so good, but its better the people who work there (Gil yilmaz, he is the best). Thank you so much, we will come back.
Very nice food, pide was amazing friendly staff and free baklava. Clean toitlet . My wife was happy. Central location. Nice ambiance.
had the garlic kebab, so delicious and comes with so much food. our waiter, Yilmaz, gave us free bread with eggplant and baklava. great service and delicious food. highly recommend
Very welcoming atmosphere. Feels cosy and warm. Food is delicious and authentic. We were very happy with our visit! Yilmaz was simply perfect, thank you very much for your service!!!
One of the best Restaurants in istanbul which i visit the next time again. excellent food and very good services by the workers.
Excellent service and food, we enjoyed our food, thank you yilmaz for your service and for offering baklava and tea. Recommand it
Was a really good place! The food was delicious! Good part of Turkish culture. We were attended by Yilmaz, he was really nice and help us choosing our lunch! We will definitely come back
a clean and pleasant place, 100% recommended to eat in a group or alone, the desserts as always are the perfect closing! welcoming and the staff very concerned about everything!
Visited in raining day so terrace was closed. But anyway totally enjoyed food, atmosphere and service. Recommend you to visit this place if you are near

locationAddress: Emin Sinan Mah. Piyer Loti Cd. H√ºlya Apt. No: 45 ƒ∞√ß Kapƒ± No: 1, Istanbul 34126 T√ºrkiye

reviews.ratingContent: Great food, and great service, eggplant kebab was great, the baklava was also super tasty. For starters you should take the yogurt plate, it's perfectly fit with the kebab.
Very kind waiters, delicious food, and a nice location, we came here in the first night of ours here in Istanbul. Oh, and we got a delicious baklava as the gift of the house.

Wow! Amazing food, fantastic atmosphere and great service! We stayed nearby and happened upon this restaurant. We would definitely come back and highly recommend it to anyone. Well worth it. Especially the clay pot kebab! Thanks for the wonderful meal!
Best place to eat Turkish cousine . Very nice people and very tasty food. Traditional experience and cheap price. A good place to go
Best one Restorant ƒ±n ƒ∞stanbul , we had here dinner and it was great , for sure we will come back here and we really enjoy that, thank you
Place is nice located near to center (blue Mosque). The food was great and big menu. The service's were helpfull and very friendly.

Nice atmosphere. Indoor and outdoor seating. Really tasty food. Friendly and helpful staff. Quick service. This place had it all.  The menu had a good variety with Turkish and also some western dishes. Reasonably priced for the area.

We have been recommended this place and we haven't been disappointed at all. The food, the staff and the atmosphere is amazing. We definitely recommend Mar Kebab when you come to Istanbul, you will love it!!!!

We initially chose this restaurant because it was located beside our hotel and had 5 star reviews on TripAdvisor. Tonight was our second visit, and tomorrow, we will go back again. The welcome is warm, and the service is efficient but not rushed. We've had hummus, vine leaves, claypot lamb, and chicken casserole, grilled chicken, and a Shepherd's salad, all of which have been delicious and cooked to perfection. The portions are enormous, and to top it off, are served with complimentary flatbread, tazeki, Turkish tea, and baklava. Dishes are reasonably priced, and customers ordering a lot or a little are treated equally. We can't recommend a visit to Mar Kebab House enough. Try it once, and you'll be hooked just like us üòÄ
We came here in the evening , our friend they told us this is good restorant and we desided to try here and it was really amazing.

We had a great lunch or more an early dinner for us. A small and cosy restaurant close to our hotel. The beef wrap I had was great. The service is excellent and a nice tea with spme baklava for free to end your meal!
This place was closer to our hotel, staff are very helpful and attentive. Excellent dinning experience. Would recommend for my family and friends.
Our hotel recommended this restaurant. Good food, good service. Good dining experience. High recommended. Would come again.
It was wonderful and we really liked, the chicken was delicious, and we try the Adana kebab also was good , ƒ± think we will come back here!

This cozy little Turkish restaurant exceeded all my expectations! The authentic national cuisine they offer is absolutely delicious and made with great care. The cozy ambiance makes you feel right at home, and the polite and attentive staff enhance the overall dining experience. I highly recommend this restaurant to anyone looking to explore and savor the flavors of Turkish cuisine. Can't wait to visit again!
The food was very good, the personal was very nice and the atmosphere authentic. We also received baklava and tea at the end. We really recomand it

The food was delicious, I got a grilled chicken, my friend eat meat balls. After food we got tea with some baklava, it was also great. The restaurant's design was beatiful, the serving was nice, the guys was very mindful.
5. It was fantastic. The service was amazing. We look after in Tripadvisor and we have some great time and food hire. Thanks a lot
This place is the best restaurant we find in Istanbul! Remember the name Mar Kebab, the location is not far away from Sophia church and blue madque

locationAddress: Alemdar Mahallesi Ticarethane Sokak, No:11, Istanbul T√ºrkiye

reviews.ratingContent: Location is super central. They are open till late and everyone is so friendly and accomodating no matter what time it is. The double apple shisha was great too. Hot chocolate and kunefe was great and the apple tea is refreshing. Staff are so welcoming, personable and charming. Must come here if you are in Sultan Ahmet!! Hamza will take care of you :)
Excellent Service!! And very tasty food! They are very polite and attentive to the clients! We can really recommend it to all the visitors!

Vamos in Istanbul offers exceptional service, with Hamza standing out as a friendly and attentive host. The food and drinks are delicious, complemented by a relaxing hookah experience. Highly recommended for a memorable evening in Istanbul.
This place is amazing if you‚Äôre traveling with kids. food was great, good wine. We had a blast. Very good customer service.
Excellent service and very good hookah, pleasant service. Highly recommended it for everyone . They provide great quality products
Very good food and wine, crock pot meat is distinctive, macaroni is delicious, salad is nice, good location and good environment.

I am not good with writing a lot. But honestly this place was very nice. The staff are super friendly and there was this Hamza guy who dances and was always ready to assist. They mostly all speak English atleast to attend to you. I had some drinks and shisha and it was great too. Music was a mix of Turkish and English. I was able to watch football as well. Overall it‚Äôs a very nice place to stop by and chill. Should you want to drive please find a parking and walk over. The street is narrow with no parking space.
Great food for late night dinner, really nice vegetarian options and kebabs. Service was great and very attentive. All options were nice.

Perfect restaurant! Very good establishment. Delicious food and very friendly staff. Had wonderful evenings and took food to go. There are shisha and interesting presentation of dishes. great atmosphere

I came all the way from the US to be impressed and welcomed by the awesome staff at Vamos! I have visited this restaurant each day of my stay. Every day, I was greeted with love and provided the best service. I can't wait to return! If you're in Istanbul, Vamos (let's go)!
Very good food and nice staff! My friend and I split desserts among us and we were given complementary Turkish tea as well! Highly recommend!
Very good kebabs and a great service such good location almost very close by all the historic places definitely recommend thank you Selcuk for your hospitality
Excellent shisha and very friendly service, heartily recommend! If you dont know where to start, you cannot go wrong here
Best food experience in Sultanahmet. Friendly staff, good location and good atmosphere. You can even choose the music yourself :).
Very good service and food, the area is great staff amazing specially hamza, they have nice urfa kebab the best in IST‚Ä¶..

Awsome place exceptional service And great food   We were looked aftered really well  Amin and hassan top guys went out of there way to cater for us Highly recommend  Must check out when your in Istanbul
Great staff, great food and very good peach liquor. Very good location close to the centre. You should try the Adana kebap, you won‚Äôt regret it.
I came here with my familly kebabs and mezes was delicious and ƒ± had best margarita ever in my life, service was good and friendly, ƒ± highly recommended this place.
Its a nice cozy place üòÄ People working here are good  Very nice location  Its value for money  It also serves hooka with great exotic flavours  They also have chai red tea on the house
Had such a lovely meal! Food was great and Hamza was friendly and handsome. Would definitely recommend

locationAddress: Alemdar Mah. Haci Tahsin Bey Sk. No : 11, Istanbul 34110 T√ºrkiye

reviews.ratingContent: Very nice place with a very kind host. Reasonable prices and lovely food. They provided a free entr√©e and tea with baklava after our breakfast. Would recommend for everyone.
Nice guys, very friendly and really good food.  Nice baklawa, and olso the th√®. Bella esperienza, ve la consiglio se passate per il centro

In my humble opinion, this is the best restaurant in Istanbul. We felt at home. A wonderful and hospitable family, they are not aggressive like other restaurateurs in this city. The food is excellent and the service is truly amazing. Visit this place and you won't regret it! üáπüá∑üá≠üá∑
My friends and I came Here the first Night of our trip and since then, se came every single day and night. We loved every single thing. You should cime!!
Great food and great atmosphere. Perfect service. We felt like family. You should come to this place when you want to really get to know how wonderfull this city and its people is.
This place is the best place to go when in Instanbul, we had the best time with the wonderfull staff. My sencire recomendations. We love u guys!
Great food, great people, great atmosphere. They dont have attacking approche like most of other restaurants and for me that was a big plus!
The best service and food in Istanbul I have experienced! We went here at way too many times considering how much we stayed in the town. I love this restaurant and can‚Äôt wait to be back!

Brilliant place and very friendly atmosphere, with staff very interactive. Food was terrific and very reasonably priced. Beer was great too!! Thanks for being so hospitable - we had 5 nights there and would have loved to have more! Thank you!

This spot is great for dinner. They have an excellent selection of food for kebabs to Turkish pizza. They gave us free nan bread with hummus with yoghurt and a spicy tomato sauce. We got the chicken and lamb kebabs. It came with a jalape√±o and a charred tomato. They also gave us free baklava 2 piece. Who ever is the cook they need to pack their bags because this food deserves to be eaten by a species that has a true understanding of what great food tastes like
Great food, good service,  fun atmosphere and great location. We had a BBQ meat and it was cooked well. We will be back! Thank you

So our hotel recommended Massa after a late flight into Istanbul. I figured it would a little pricey and just ok food. Boy was I wrong. The food was insanely good, the prices were great and the people working there were fun and nice. I will recommend this place to all my friends and I plan to eat something different there each night for the entire stay. I‚Äôm a raving fan of Massa.
Very good food and service, got the food quickly. Had the need tenderloin, reformens it very much. Got tea and baklava for free!
Best in turkey, very good food and Nice staff. Will Come back here soon. Thank you for the food and service. Recommend this to everyone.
Wonderful place! Food was fantastic and good value for money. We were very well looked after by all the staff! Complimentary bread/dips and baklava! Would highly recommend‚Ä¶

I spent two beautiful evenings at this restaurant. The food was very good, the appetizers as well. Excellently cooked mutton. But the service and the atmosphere make the difference compared to other restaurants in the area. Thank you very much, we will definitely come back.
Best place in Istanbul! Atmopshere is amazing, food is the best and owners are the best! Been here before and definitely come again!

Not our first time here and certanly not the last... The brothers who own the place are great guys, making us feel so welcome and nice. Food is great, atmosphere vibrant, warm, making our dinner a wonderful expirience. I reccomend this place as a "must...More
Went here for dinner and had a great food with great atmosphere! Try a dish called "testi", you will also get a small show :)

5/5! Guys are here amazing! They made out trip more funnier and better! Nice atmosphere, good food and best service! I recommend as they are open all time and always have place.  And Bibo and  Hako are  one of the best waiters!
